comments.author: The Italian Dish
comments.content: Thanks for the great book review.  I'm pretty much a cookbook/food book addict.  I love reading about new books and you sold me on this one!

comments.author: Joanna
comments.content: Okay, I'm sold!  Actually, I read another review of this book earlier this week, and I was mostly sold then, but now your glowing review has pushed me over the edge.  I often take a "throw everything in the pot" approach to cooking, but a book like this might help me reign in those tendencies and really focus on what flavors work well together.

comments.author: Micha
comments.content:
I think I clicked over here from tastespotting...

Thanks for the review - I definitely have to get this book now.  I've been searching for a similar type of reference on the web but haven't found anything as thorough as this sounds.

Also, loved the recipe for the Achiote-Rubbed Butternut Squash Tacos.  I think I'll be making a variation on this in the near future...
